matched_points.point: Extroverted and socially active, but sometimes appears neglectful in intimate relationships.
Explains his/her late return due to the gathering in a casual tone, attempting to ease tension with a gentle attitude.
Hopes to alleviate B's dissatisfaction with gentle words while avoiding direct acknowledgment of the mistake.
A is aware that frequent social engagements recently have objectively led to reduced interaction with B.
Reserved and sensitive, desiring more attention without appearing overly dependent.
Expresses feelings subtly and uses gentle questions to hint at personal loss during conversations, remaining polite and restrained.
Hopes that A will proactively show attention to alleviate the loneliness and restore warm interaction between them.
B has repeatedly experienced loneliness due to A's absence and objectively hopes to improve the situation through conversation.
